name: PixelMarketo Media
description:
PixelMarketo Media is India's largest full service interactive media agency including digital and conventional channels. We offer end to end designing, digital marketing and branding solutions to all size of businesses and entities globally with an aim to Provide high quality digital platforms and marketing solutions. Our comprehensive bouquet of services range from SEO, PPC, SMM, Google Street View Shoot, Designing Development, PR & Branding solutions.
Our team has domain expertise in designing and development across all major industries and sectors.
